:v-model:active.description: The active tab identities match the name first, followed by the index
:v-model:active.description_zh: 激活的选项卡标识, 优先匹配 name，其次是 index

layout-direction.description: The layout direction of the tab group, optionally 'horizontal' vertical
layout-direction.description_zh: 选项卡组的布局方向，可选值为 `horizontal` vertical

item-direction.description: The layout orientation of the tab, optionally 'horizontal' vertical
item-direction.description_zh: 选项卡的布局方向，可选值为 `horizontal` vertical

fixed-bottom.description: Whether it is fixed at the bottom of the window can be used as a bottom navigation
fixed-bottom.description_zh: 是否固定在窗口底部, 可用做底部导航

color.description: The background color of the tab

active-color.description: The tab activates the primary color
active-color.description_zh: 选项卡激活的主要颜色

inactive-color.description: The tab is not activated by the main color
inactive-color.description_zh: 选项卡未激活的主要颜色

disabled-color.description: The primary color when the tab is disabled
disabled-color.description_zh: 选项卡禁用时的主要颜色

indicator-color.description: The color of the tab activation indicator
indicator-color.description_zh: 选项卡激活指示器的颜色

indicator-size.description: The size of the tab activation indicator
indicator-size.description_zh: 选项卡激活指示器的尺寸

elevation.description: Altitude, with selectable values of 'true', 'false' and '0-24'
elevation.description_zh: 海拔高度，可选值为 `true` `false` 和 `0-24` 的等级

sticky-css-mode.description: Whether or not to enable the native CSS sticky mode for sticky layouts
sticky-css-mode.description_zh: 是否启用粘性布局的原生 css sticky 模式

safe-area.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

scrollable.description: Whether to enable scrolling, the optional value is 'auto' always
scrollable.description_zh: 是否开启滚动，可选值为 `auto` always

indicator-position.description: The location of the tab activation indicator, optionally 'normal' reverse
indicator-position.description_zh: 选项卡激活指示器的位置，可选值为 `normal` reverse

methods.name: resize
methods.description: This method can be called to redraw the tab group when a position size change occurs
methods.description_zh: 产生位置大小变化时可以调用此方法重绘选项卡组

methods.name: resizeSticky
methods.description: This method can be called to redraw the sticky layout when there is a change in position size
methods.description_zh: 产生位置大小变化时可以调用此方法重绘粘性布局

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a tab is clicked, not when the tab is 'disabled' and 'true'
events.description_zh: 点击选项卡时触发, 在选项卡 `disabled` 状态为 `true` 时不触发
